resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>918</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Natural Disasters Quiz</string>
            <string language="es">Cuestionario sobre desastres naturales</string>
            <string language="ga">Tráth na gCeist faoi Thubaistí Nádúrtha</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Naturkatastrophe-Quiz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Jeu de Désastres Normaux</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Quiz Dos Disastres Naturais</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Quiz Di Disastri Naturali</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαγωνισμός γνώσεων φυσικών καταστροφών</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Pupils will name the different types of natural disasters which occur from time to time. Pupils will describe the causes of the different natural disasters. Pupils will describe the effects they have on people and their environment. Pupils will locate, on a map, places which have been affected by natural disasters.</string>
            <string language="es">Los alumnos nombrarán tipos diferentes de desastres naturales que ocurren de vez en cuando. Los alumnos describirán las causas de los diferentes desastres naturales. Los alumnos describirán los efectos que tienen sobre la gente y su entorno. Los alumnos l</string>
            <string language="ga">Ainmneoidh na daltai na cineálacha difriúla tubaistí nádúrtha a tharlaíonn o am go ham. Cuirfidh na daltaí síos ar na rudaí is cúis le tubaistí nádúrtha difriúla. Cuirfidh na daltaí síos ar na héifeachtaí a bhíonn acu ar dhaoine agus a dtimpeallacht. Gheo</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">SESE Geography</string>
            <string language="es">Geografía SESE</string>
            <string language="ga">OSIE Tíreolaíocht</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Pupillen benennen die unterschiedlichen Typen der 
Naturkatastrophen, die von Zeit zu Zeit auftreten. Pupillen 
beschreiben die Ursachen der unterschiedlichen Naturkatastrophen. 
Pupillen beschreiben die Effekte, die sie auf Leuten und ihrer 
Umgebung haben. Pupillen errichten, auf einer Karte, Plätze, 
die durch Naturkatastrophen beeinflußt worden sind.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les pupilles nommeront les différents types de 
désastres normaux qui se produisent de temps en temps. Les 
pupilles décriront les causes des différents désastres normaux. 
Les pupilles décriront les effets qu'elles ont sur les 
personnes et leur environnement. Les pupilles plac, sur une 
carte, les endroits qui ont été affectés par des désastres 
normaux.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As pupilas nomearão os tipos diferentes de 
disastres naturais que ocorrem do tempo ao tempo. As pupilas 
descreverão as causas dos disastres naturais diferentes. As 
pupilas descreverão os efeitos que têm em povos e em seu ambiente. 
As pupilas ficarão, em um mapa, os lugares que foram afetados 
por disastres naturais.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le pupille chiameranno i tipi differenti di 
disastri naturali che si presentano di tanto in tanto. Le 
pupille descriveranno le cause dei disastri naturali differenti. 
Le pupille descriveranno gli effetti che hanno sulla gente e sul
loro ambiente. Le pupille posizioneranno, su un programma, i 
posti che sono stati influenzati dai disastri naturali.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι μαθητές θα ονομάσουν τους διαφορετικούς τύπους 
φυσικών καταστροφών που συμβαίνουν κατά διαστήματα. Οι 
μαθητές θα περιγράψουν τις αιτίες των διαφορετικών φυσικών 
καταστροφών. Οι μαθητές θα περιγράψουν τα αποτελέσματα που 
έχουν στους ανθρώπους και το περιβάλλον τους. Οι μαθητές θα 
εντοπίσουν, σε έναν χάρτη, τις θέσεις που έχουν επηρεαστεί από 
τις φυσικές καταστροφές.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">SESE Geographie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Géographie de SESE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Geografia de SESE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Geografia di SESE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γεωγραφία SESE</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.
